songs.title: My All/Stay Awhile (So So Def Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Mariah Carey & Lord Tariq]
I told you, if Jermaine like it then I like it
Don't leave me, don't, don't leave me (So so def)

Don't leave me, don't, don't leave me

1-	[] (JD)

Uh huh, uh huh MC like what (What)
Uh huh, uh huh and JD like what (What)
Uh huh, uh huh, uh huh and Lord Tariq like what (What)
Uh huh, uh huh, uh huh and Peter Gunz like what (What)
Uh huh, uh huh, uh huh and Trey whop like what (What)
[Peter Gunz]
Uh, and Uptown play, play on
Soundview play, play on and a
V X play, play on
74 play, play on
MC play, play on and a

[Verse 1: Mariah Carey]
I am thinking of you (That's right)
In my sleepless solitude tonight (Yeah)
If it's wrong to love you (I like that)
Then my heart just won't let me be right
'Cause I've drowned in you (Uh huh)
And I won't pull through
Without you by my side (Oh yeah)

I'd give my all to have
Just one more night with you
I'd risk my life to feel
Your body next to mine
'Cause I can't go on
Living in the memory of our song
I'd give my all for your love tonight
(MC, come on)

[Verse 2: Mariah Carey]
Your loving arms around me, boy
And like that was a cuddling talk (That's right)
And a feel that won't
I feel damn great
And won't let go, ooowwohhh
'Cause that could be no sadder (No)
Sight to see
Than if we were to miss (Uh huh)
This opportunity (So what)
So send me up a signal and I'll catch the light (Yeah)
If there's no time (Uh huh)
You know it's up to you (Uh huh, yeah)
So, won't you...

Stay a night, child
Stay a little while, child
Stay a night, child
Stay a night, child

[JD]
And let's take it Uptown, beat it down

[Peter Gunz] (JD)
Since you put it that way, honey, I'm gon' stay (Yeah)
And only your love can make Peter parley (Uh)
Let the limo leave and cancel the flight
And I, only will I stay, girl I'm spendin' the night (Uh huh)
And if it's right, I'm spendin' my life, or album
If it seems like I'm rushin' then I'll sleep on the couch
MC it's your call, I'm ready to ball
And if you need me, I'm ready to brawl (Uh huh, uh huh)

[Lord Tariq] (JD)
And that's forever by law, together we ball, we taking it all
I'll make you feel a way a woman never felt before
I see women on many levels, never higher than yours
With a body like that, that face, no flaw
You got to be havin sense, saying you's a dime
You off to meet her in a seven and you like the way I rhyme
Yes I shine, I'm a veteran
Picture me and honey spendin' money like whatever then
(Ha ha ha) We both got it

Repeat 3
[JD]
Come on
Sing along
Yeah
Ha ha, c'mon

Mariah Carey:
Ain't no need (Uh, uh huh)
To act surprised (Say what)
Cause that's a move that's not so right
So let's push love to the limit (Uh huh)
And life to the edge
I only want to lust again (Understand)
Sing the whole world

Repeat 1 & 2 (w/o JD)
